articles.title: 1993 Mumbai blasts case: Four accused sent in judicial custody
articles.description: The four men, who were declared absconding, were brought to Mumbai last week and the CBI had sought their custody to probe their role in the 1993 blasts case.
articles.content: Four accused arrested in the Mumbai 1993 serial blasts case were sent in judicial custody till June 13 by a special court on Monday.
